name: Performapal Five-Rainbow Magician
desc:
Pendulum Effect
You cannot Pendulum Summon monsters, except from your Extra Deck. This effect cannot be negated. Apply these effects to each player depending on the number of cards Set in their Spell & Trap Zones.
● 0: Monsters they control cannot attack or activate their effects.
 ● 4 or more: The ATK of all monsters they control become double their original ATK.

Monster Effect
If a Spell/Trap Card(s) is Set on your field while this card is in your GY (except during the Damage Step): You can place this card in your Pendulum Zone.
